Attributes.Value:
Following Entities are available for merging
contact, ecer_application, ecer_reconsiderationrequest, ecer_icraeligibilityassessment, ecer_transcript
ecer_investigation, ecer_pspreferral, ecer_postsecondaryinstitute, ecer_eceprogramrepresentative
ecer_postsecondaryinstitute, ecer_program, ecer_postsecondaryinstituteprogramapplicaiton

To Get Attribute List, go to
https://myeceregistrydev.crm3.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2/EntityDefinitions(LogicalName='[entity name]')/Attributes?$select=SchemaName,LogicalName,AttributeType,DisplayName

Use Pretty Print from Chrome or other JSON Viewer for better results
